metadata.Title: CVE-2020-28476 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium.
metadata.Description: ** REJECT ** DO NOT USE THIS CANDIDATE NUMBER. ConsultIDs: CVE-2021-23336. Reason: This candidate is a reservation duplicate of CVE-2021-23336. Notes: All CVE users should reference CVE-2021-23336 instead of this candidate. All references and descriptions in this candidate have been removed to prevent accidental usage.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> per tornado developers, this isn't an issue in tornado itself, but in the python standard library. as of 2021-01-29, no details on possible fix from upstream

criterions.comment: python-tornado: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
